Articles.Content:
So recently, when trying to revert a flight, the button is broken, clicking it results in a window appearing like this one:

http://imgur.com/xLVtWdU (not my image, but shows my problem)

Looking through the logs myself, I cant really tell what is breaking it in such a way. Here are my logs:

 

https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/14006682/KSP.log

 

https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/14006682/output_log.txt
for me the solution was to start a new save. the save was probably corrupted. I hope you didnt have anything big.
